verbose_text: Like LY294002, the more specific inhibition resulted in defective silencing of TCF1, reduced cell surface trafficking of Glut1, diminished glucose uptake (XREF_FIG), and defective CD3 polarity, the latter appearing more severe in interphase cells than metaphase cells (XREF_FIG).
evidence: TCF1, reduced cell surface trafficking of Glut1, diminished glucose
